basics.name: Vicente Opaso
basics.label:
Web Engineering Manager & Frontend Architect
Expert in Composable Platforms, Design Systems & Developer Experience
25+ Years Delivering High-Impact Digital Solutions
basics.summary:
I’m a Senior Frontend Architect and Technical Lead with over 25 years of experience designing scalable digital platforms and leading high-impact engineering teams. Currently, I lead Web Engineering at Nexthink, where I manage the team behind nexthink.com — a composable platform supporting global brand, marketing, and product strategy.

Before this, I held the role of Technical Application Owner at Eurocontrol, focused on modernizing aviation systems through user-centered design and robust architecture. Prior to that, I spent over five years at Carlsberg Group, where I led the development of global B2B platforms with over €1B in annual turnover, architected the Malty Design System, and helped establish a thriving Community of Practice to drive innovation and knowledge sharing across the organization. I’ve also co-founded and scaled a digital agency, GreyGoo, delivering solutions for clients like GM and the NCAA.

I specialize in Frontend Architecture, Design Systems, Developer Experience (DX), and building communities that scale both code and culture.

Owning the delivery and architecture of nexthink.com — a global composable marketing platform — while leading a cross-functional team focused on performance, accessibility, and strategic alignment

Leading the frontend modernization of critical aviation systems with a focus on governance, maintainability, and performance

Design System Architect for EDS (Eurocontrol Design System) and Malty
Driving consistency, accessibility, and scalability across platforms

Founding and leading CoPs to align engineering practices across global teams

Agile Practitioner
Experienced in leading cross-functional squads through continuous delivery and iterative improvement

Digital Agency Co-founder
Delivering full-stack web and mobile solutions for Fortune 500 and public sector clients

work.position: Lead Developer and Architect for Malty Design System
work.summary:
As the Lead Developer for Malty Design System, I oversaw the development and maintenance of our internal design system using inner sourcing as our collaboration model.
Initially, the product required significant collaboration between our design and development teams to translate designs into developable components. And later, documenting a design system has proven to be a full-time job, requiring deep collaboration between design and development, as well as the business.
While most products were already in place, I am currently leading efforts to increase the penetration of Malty into our products. Through my work, Malty has become a core component of our digital ecosystem, providing a consistent and intuitive user experience across our products.
Selected achievements:
highlights: Architected and developed Malty Design System, implementing inner sourcing collaboration model
Successfully established Malty as a core component of the organization's digital ecosystem
Helped document design system, requiring deep collaboration between design, development, and business
Spearheading efforts to increase Malty's penetration into existing products for consistent user experience.

work.summary:
As a Principal Developer with a frontend focus, I was responsible for overseeing several critical components of our organization's technology ecosystem.
One of my key responsibilities was co-managing the development of Carlshop+, one of Carlsberg's B2B eCommerce platforms, generating over 1 billion euros in revenue each year. Additionally, I was responsible for frontend Development of Carlsberg's Cadi, an in-house built CRM system, ensuring that customer data was handled accurately and securely, and managing a team of frontend developers.
Another crucial aspect of my role was overseeing the development and maintenance of Malty Design System and Lean Sign-up platform, which helped to streamline our customer onboarding process.
Overall, my experience as a Principal Developer allowed me to play a critical role in driving the success of our organization. By focusing on frontend development and overseeing these critical initiatives, I helped ensure that our technology ecosystem was always at the highest possible standard.
Selected achievements:
highlights: Co-managed the development of B2B eCommerce platform (€1bn+ revenue/year)
Architected and developed Malty Design System from the greenfield
Oversaw development and maintenance of in-house built CRM system leading a team of frontend developers.

references.name: Peter Birkholm-Buch | Director of Software Engineering in Growth Products & Data @ Carlsberg Group

As our Frontend Solutions Architect, Vicente played a critical role in shaping our frontend strategy, notably through the development of the Malty Design System, which has transformed how we approach global frontend solutions.

His technical expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Frontend technologies, combined with his leadership in establishing a Community of Practice, has greatly improved the developer experience and code quality across the organization. Vicente's contributions were instrumental in driving our e-commerce growth to over €1 billion annually.

I highly recommend Vicente for his leadership, creativity, and exceptional technical skills. He would be a tremendous asset to any team.
